title: Model Redirect
description: Automatic model redirect mapping, solving the problem of inability to uniformly call models due to model names
enableDesc: Enable the model redirect mapping feature, which will run automatically during model synchronization and allow manual execution
standardModelsDesc: Select the standard models to generate redirect mappings for
pruneMissingTargetsOnModelSync: Prune invalid redirect targets after sync
pruneMissingTargetsOnModelSyncDesc: Destructive: after a model sync refresh, deletes existing model_mapping entries whose target models are missing from the refreshed model list

messages.updateFailed: Failed to update model redirect settings
messages.noModelsSelected: Please select at least one standard model

bulkClear.actionDesc: Set selected channels' model_mapping to an empty object ({}). This cannot be undone.

preview.title: Clear model redirect maps
preview.description: Select which channels to clear. Unselected channels will not be changed.
preview.mappingInvalid: Current model_mapping is not valid JSON; showing raw text.

confirm.title: Clear model redirect maps?
confirm.description: This will clear model redirect maps for {{count}} channel(s). This cannot be undone.

status.emptySelection: Select at least one channel to continue.

messages.allSuccess: Cleared model redirect maps for {{count}} channel(s).
messages.nothingToClear: Nothing to clear (selected channels are already empty).
messages.failed: Failed to clear model redirect maps: {{error}}
